content:
Running inside a LXC container, I get these messages every hour:

Subject: Cron <zulip@blommetjie> /home/zulip/deployments/current/manage.py update_analytics_counts
:
^[[93mAnalytics lock %s is unavailable; exiting... ^[[0m

Where do I start to try and find the problem?
I think you can just delete it if you believe that update_analytics_counts is indeed not currently running.

okay, seems I had some permissions issues, so I just did a total reinstall,
But thanks, will keep an eye on that directory!
